title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Advanced Online Medical Professional Education: Digital-Based Clinical Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of healthcare services and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in applying clinical protocols using online simulation tools
Learners analyze and interpret clinical data using a digital patient record system
Learners perform collaborative problem-solving case studies with peers via virtual communities at least three times
Learners achieve a comprehensive evaluation score of 85+ points in the online assessment system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
